title: Short-Intensive Online Real-Time PPKN Character-Based Instructional Design Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Fundamental Citizenship Education Concepts and Experience with Online Learning Tools
context.additional_context: Mixed-methods R&D (research and development) and Dick & Carey model application for developing science-integrated PPKN (Character Education) characters

learning_goals: Learners establish practical plans to apply the 5S principles (smile, greeting, manners) in daily life
Learners design integrity and hygiene habit formation strategies reflecting religious/non-religious values
Learners propose methods for cultivating aesthetic sensibility through art activities (visual arts, music)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
